name: Dolly (Forward/Backward)
description: Camera moving forward or backward on tracks, creating depth and immersion

prompt.base: Dolly camera movement, moving forward or backward, camera on tracks, push-in or pull-out, creating depth, smooth forward motion, dolly in or dolly out, immersive movement
prompt.positive: dolly shot, camera moving forward, camera moving backward, push-in, pull-out, dolly in, dolly out, smooth tracking, depth creation, immersive movement, forward motion, backward motion
prompt.negative: static camera, panning, tilting, zoom, no camera movement, fixed position, rotation only

technical.movement_type: Linear forward or backward on tracks
technical.speed: Slow to medium for dramatic effect
technical.use_cases: Dramatic reveals, emotional intensity, creating depth, immersive storytelling

examples: Camera dollying in on character's face, slow push-in creating emotional intensity
Dolly out revealing the full scene, pulling back to show context and environment
